holidays.title: Martin Luther King Jr. Day
holidays.description: Take time to reflect and take action on civil rights issues across the globe.

holidays.title: National Fig Newton Day
holidays.description: Ready to get figgy with it? We’ve got everything to make your day pretty sweet.

holidays.title: National Nothing Day
holidays.description: If you’re doing nothing, aren’t you doing something, with nothing as the thing you’re doing?

holidays.title: Appreciate a Dragon Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some exhilaration as we celebrate one of man’s greatest imaginative creatures.

holidays.title: Blue Monday
holidays.description: Are we destined to be blue on this specific Monday? Read on and decide, if so!

holidays.title: Book Publishers Day
holidays.description: Come along, let’s celebrate industrious people who make books available to us all.

holidays.title: Brew Monday
holidays.description: Time to schedule a meeting with someone who finds this cold, gray winter’s day an obstacle.

holidays.title: Civil Rights Day
holidays.description: In the words of Frederick Douglass: “If there is no struggle, there is no progress.”

holidays.title: Elementary School Teacher Day
holidays.description: Elementary school teachers leave a lasting impression on us with their warmth and kindness.

holidays.title: Idaho Human Rights Day
holidays.description: Prepare for a parade honoring the life of Martin Luther King Jr., our favorite civil-rights activist.

holidays.title: International Hot and Spicy Food Day
holidays.description: On this day, get ready to consume some delicious, yet super spicy dishes.

holidays.title: National Boston Day
holidays.description: Bring your party glasses and cakes as we celebrate this day and the name, Boston!

holidays.title: National Good Teen Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate teens who make an effort to be responsible members of society.

holidays.title: National Quinoa Day
holidays.description: Get your plates out as we serve up some information about quinoa.

holidays.title: National Religious Freedom Day
holidays.description: On this day, promote the message of religious acceptance in any way you can.

holidays.title: National Without a Scalpel Day
holidays.description: Join in as we celebrate one of the most remarkable medical innovations.

holidays.title: Prohibition Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Prepare to observe a day that reminds us of the need to stay clear-headed.

holidays.title: Signing of the Peace Accords
holidays.description: The peace agreements were historic for El Salvador, and we’ve got all the details here.

holidays.title: Aaliyah’s Birthday
holidays.description: Talented, beautiful, and modest — three words that perfectly describe Aaliyah, the R&B singer-turned-actress.

holidays.title: Jennie Kim’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Korean superstar is phenomenal; she has the world at her feet!

holidays.title: Jubilee Sharpe’s Birthday
holidays.description: Like the phoenix, Sharpe has risen from the ashes and focuses on a brighter future.

holidays.title: Lin-Manuel Miranda’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lin-Manuel Miranda has conquered Broadway and nothing can stop him from achieving more.

holidays.title: Ruby Rube’s Birthday
holidays.description: The richness and hilarity of this young and talented influencer’s content are unmatched.

holidays.title: Sidharth Malhotra’s Birthday
holidays.description: The handsome and talented model-turned-actor has amassed millions of fans throughout his career.
